Overview

The third NUMBAT hackathon was held Feb 22-24, 2023 in San Remo, Vic. A hackathon is style like RopenSci events where attendees brainstorm potential projects, and join to gether in small groups to tackle a subset of these.

Projects

Projects tackled can be found on [github](https://github.com/numbats/numbathackathon/issues).
